rows.label: tlk70000021_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Hm? You need something? As you can
see, things are busy around here.

rows.label: tlk70000021_01_msg0002
rows.name:
So the Holy Grail has been wrecking stuff
all over the place, right? Well, it's made
my ship orders go through the roof.

rows.label: tlk70000021_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Of course it happens right when
my master retires, too. We're
desperately short-staffed.

rows.label: tlk70000021_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I didn't think it would be this hard
to take everything on myself, but
responsibility is more than I imagined.
